title: Lawyer Steven Donziger Under House Arrest for Suing Chevron
description:
Human rights lawyer Steven Donziger has been trapped in his apartment for two years without a fair trial. Hear his story.
Plus: Biden and Republicans kill journalists while the Queen kills her dog
